alternateName: One-way flights found on Expedia between 2022-04-16 and 2022-10-05

distribution.name: archive.zip
distribution.description: Archive containing all the contents of the Flight Prices dataset

distribution.name: itineraries.csv
distribution.description: CSV file. Each row represents a record for a flight found on Expedia. The same flight will appear on multiple rows, as the price may change day-to-day.

field.name: legId
field.description: Identifier for the flight.

field.name: searchDate
field.description: Date the record was obtained from Expedia.

field.name: flightDate
field.description: The date of the flight.

field.name: startingAirport
field.description: 3-letter code for the starting airport.

field.name: destinationAirport
field.description: 3-letter code for the destination airport.

field.name: fareBasisCode
field.description: Fare basis code.

field.name: travelDuration
field.description: Travel duration in hours and minutes.

field.name: elapsedDays
field.description: Number of elapsed days for the flight.

field.name: isBasicEconomy
field.description: Is basic economy?

field.name: isRefundable
field.description: Is the ticket refundable?

field.name: isNonStop
field.description: Is the flight non-stop?

field.name: baseFare
field.description: Price of the ticket (not including taxes).

field.name: totalFare
field.description: Price of the ticket, including taxes and fees.

field.name: seatsRemaining
field.description: Number of remaining seats.

field.name: totalTravelDistance
field.description: The total travel distance in miles.

field.name: segmentsDepartureTimeEpochSeconds
field.description: Departure time for each leg (Unix time).

field.name: segmentsDepartureTimeRaw
field.description: Departure time for each leg (human-legible date format).

field.name: segmentsArrivalTimeEpochSeconds
field.description: Arrival time for each leg (Unix time).

field.name: segmentsArrivalTimeRaw
field.description: Arrival time for each leg (human-legible date format).

field.name: segmentsArrivalAirportCode
field.description: Arrival airport for each leg.

field.name: segmentsDepartureAirportCode
field.description: Departure airport for each leg.

field.name: segmentsAirlineName
field.description: Name of the airline for each leg.

field.name: segmentsAirlineCode
field.description: Code for the airline for each leg.

field.name: segmentsEquipmentDescription
field.description: Type of airplane, for each leg.

field.name: segmentsDurationInSeconds
field.description: Flight duration in seconds, for each leg.

field.name: segmentsDistance
field.description: Flight distance in miles, for each leg.

field.name: segmentsCabinCode
field.description: Cabin, for each leg.

recordSet.name: itineraries.csv
recordSet.description: CSV file. Each row represents a record for a flight found on Expedia. The same flight will appear on multiple rows, as the price may change day-to-day.

keywords: subject > science and technology > transportation > aviation
geography and places > north america > united states
name: Flight Prices
description:
This dataset is a CSV file where each row is a purchasable ticket found on Expedia between 2022-04-16 and 2022-10-05, to/from the following airports: ATL, DFW, DEN, ORD, LAX, CLT, MIA, JFK, EWR, SFO, DTW, BOS, PHL, LGA, IAD, OAK.

Compressed versions of the data (CSV in 7zip, Apache Parquet) can be downloaded here: https://github.com/dilwong/FlightPrices

Column definitions:
- legId: An identifier for the flight.
- searchDate: The date (YYYY-MM-DD) on which this entry was taken from Expedia.
- flightDate: The date (YYYY-MM-DD) of the flight.
- startingAirport: Three-character IATA airport code for the initial location.
- destinationAirport: Three-character IATA airport code for the arrival location.
- fareBasisCode: The fare basis code.
- travelDuration: The travel duration in hours and minutes.
- elapsedDays: The number of elapsed days (usually 0).
- isBasicEconomy: Boolean for whether the ticket is for basic economy.
- isRefundable: Boolean for whether the ticket is refundable.
- isNonStop: Boolean for whether the flight is non-stop.
- baseFare: The price of the ticket (in USD).
- totalFare: The price of the ticket (in USD) including taxes and other fees.
- seatsRemaining: Integer for the number of seats remaining.
- totalTravelDistance: The total travel distance in miles. This data is sometimes missing.
- segmentsDepartureTimeEpochSeconds: String containing the departure time (Unix time) for each leg of the trip. The entries for each of the legs are separated by '||'.
- segmentsDepartureTimeRaw: String containing the departure time (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.000±[hh]:00) for each leg of the trip. The entries for each of the legs are separated by '||'.
- segmentsArrivalTimeEpochSeconds: String containing the arrival time (Unix time) for each leg of the trip. The entries for each of the legs are separated by '||'.
- segmentsArrivalTimeRaw: String containing the arrival time (ISO 8601 format: YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ss.000±[hh]:00) for each leg of the trip. The entries for each of the legs are separated by '||'.
- segmentsArrivalAirportCode: String containing the IATA airport code for the arrival location for each leg of the trip. The entries for each of the legs are separated by '||'.
- segmentsDepartureAirportCode: String containing the IATA airport code for the departure location for each leg of the trip. The entries for each of the legs are separated by '||'.
- segmentsAirlineName: String containing the name of the airline that services each leg of the trip. The entries for each of the legs are separated by '||'.
- segmentsAirlineCode: String containing the two-letter airline code that services each leg of the trip. The entries for each of the legs are separated by '||'.
- segmentsEquipmentDescription: String containing the type of airplane used for each leg of the trip (e.g. "Airbus A321" or "Boeing 737-800"). The entries for each of the legs are separated by '||'.
- segmentsDurationInSeconds: String containing the duration of the flight (in seconds) for each leg of the trip. The entries for each of the legs are separated by '||'.
- segmentsDistance: String containing the distance traveled (in miles) for each leg of the trip. The entries for each of the legs are separated by '||'.
- segmentsCabinCode: String containing the cabin for each leg of the trip (e.g. "coach"). The entries for each of the legs are separated by '||'.

Credit for the photograph here: https://unsplash.com/photos/rf6ywHVkrlY
